sqlMap.select: SELECT A.saleid , A.loginid , A.oid , A.filename , A.productid , A.edition , B.label AS licenseusage , A.licenseusagefactor , C.label AS licenseterm , A.licensetermfactor , D.label AS licensesize , A.licensesizefactor , CASE A.serialnum WHEN '' THEN '미발급' ELSE '발급' END AS serialnum , A.productserial , A.hardwarekey , A.replacedid , DATE_FORMAT(A.saledate, '%Y-%m-%d') AS saledate , DATE_FORMAT(A.expiredate, '%Y-%m-%d') AS expiredate , DATE_FORMAT(A.saletime, '%H:%m:%s') AS saletime , A.shipping , A.isshipped , A.shippingid , A.academicauth , A.fullname , A.orgname , A.address1 , A.address2 , A.city , A.state , A.zipcode , A.country , A.phone , A.email , A.on_offline , A.note , A.wintype , A.offlinecode , A.manual , A.education , A.registercount , A.registered FROM sale_new A LEFT JOIN licenseusage B ON A.licenseusage = B.id LEFT JOIN licenseterm C ON A.licenseterm = C.id LEFT JOIN licensesize D ON A.licensesize = D.id WHERE 1 = 1 AND A.loginid = #sessionId# AND A.replacedid = -1 ORDER BY saledate ASC, saletime ASC
